alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 08 at 3:58AM PST until December 08 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 36 possible. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
